meanings.definition: A two-wheeled vehicle with an engine and a saddle for the rider.
meanings.sent1: My brother's motorbike is red and shiny.
meanings.sent2: She rode her motorbike to work every day.
meanings.sent3: The motorbike seemed to have a mind of its own, zooming around the yard.
meanings.sent4: His love for his motorbike was like a flame that never went out.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the motorbike echoed through the empty streets at night.

meanings.definition: To ride or travel on a motorbike.
meanings.sent1: I will motorbike to the store to get some groceries.
meanings.sent2: They motorbike through the countryside on weekends.
meanings.sent3: She decided to motorbike to the top of the hill for a better view.
meanings.sent4: His dreams would motorbike him to far-off lands while he slept.
meanings.sent5: The wind in his hair as he motorbiked along the coast was exhilarating.
